product_name: Twin Six The Queen Of The Mountain Bike Socks - Women's
long_description: Wear the women's Twin Six Queen of the Mountain Bike Socks with the matching jersey and you'll be riding high in eye-catching polka-dot mode with a big grin on your face. Coolmax(R) polyester fibers wick moisture and dry fast. Socks have a standard crew height of 3 in. with no cushioning.
short_description: Wear the women's Twin Six Queen of the Mountain Bike Socks with the matching jersey and you'll be riding high in eye-catching polka-dot mode with a big grin on your face.
